Class SingleOperator

java.lang.Object
  ExpressionNode
      SingleOperator

public abstract class SingleOperator
extends ExpressionNode

One kind of all possible node is Single Operators, its mean the operator that need only one parameter. For example, sine and cosine functions need value to multiply with PI

          First of all, when the node is created, its will assing values to super class (for initial the variable that required) then will create an sub tree for expresstion tree by generateExpression method.
